summary.span: 表示含有檔案和目錄的隔離儲存區 (Isolated Storage)。

span.span: Represents an isolated storage area containing files and directories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此物件會對應至特定的隔離儲存區範圍內，檔案會由物件存在。This object corresponds to a specific isolated storage scope, where files represented by objects exist. 應用程式可以使用隔離儲存區將資料儲存在他們自己單獨的檔案系統中，部分，而不需要指定檔案系統中的特定路徑。Applications can use isolated storage to save data in their own isolated portion of the file system, without having to specify a particular path within the file system. 隔離儲存區範圍設定為特定的組件，因為大部分其他 managed 程式碼將無法存取您的程式碼的資料 （高度信任的 managed 程式碼和系統管理工具可以從其他組件存取存放區）。Since isolated stores are scoped to particular assemblies, most other managed code will not be able to access your code's data (highly trusted managed code and administration tools can access stores from other assemblies). Unmanaged 程式碼可以存取任何隔離的存放區。Unmanaged code can access any isolated stores. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 隔離儲存區](~/docs/standard/io/isolated-storage.md)。For more information, see [Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/isolated-storage.md). 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 應用程式無法使用隔離儲存區。Isolated storage is not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 請改用 `Windows.Storage` 應用程式開發介面內含的 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 命名空間中的應用程式資料類別來儲存本機資料和檔案。Instead, use the application data classes in the `Windows.Storage` namespaces included in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] API to store local data and files. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Windows 開發人員中心的 [應用程式資料](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) 。For more information, see [Application data](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) in the Windows Dev Center. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何在隔離存放區中建立檔案和目錄。The following code example illustrates how to create files and directories in an isolated store. 首先，依使用者、 定義域和組件隔離的存放區會擷取並放置於`isoStore`變數。First, a store that is isolated by user, domain, and assembly is retrieved and placed in the `isoStore` variable. 接著會呼叫方法來建立目錄和兩個執行個體類別建立這些目錄中的檔案。The method is then called to create directories, and two instances of the class create files in these directories. span.span: The total number of bytes of storage currently in use within the isolated storage scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表所有檔案和目錄的隔離儲存區範圍內的總使用量。Represents the total usage of all files and directories within the isolated storage scope. 參與漫遊使用者設定檔的存放區無法精確地判斷目前的大小。The current size cannot be accurately determined for stores that are participating in a roaming user profile. 漫遊設定檔是通常在多個用戶端電腦上快取和更新版本與伺服器同步，因為無法強制執行配額，這類存放區，並不會報告目前的大小。Because roaming profiles are often cached on multiple client machines and later synchronized with a server, quotas cannot be enforced for such stores and the current size is not reported. [How to： 預期隔離儲存區外的空間條件](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md)範例示範如何使用屬性。The [How to: Anticipate Out-of-Space Conditions with Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md) example demonstrates the use of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 此範例的完整內容，請參閱概觀。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that was occupying. > [!NOTE] > 發行您最後一個參考之前，務必呼叫 Dispose 。Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the . 否則，資源會使用之前，將不會釋放記憶體回收集合呼叫物件的方法。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟隔離儲存區檔案、 使用它來將資訊寫入至資料流、 關閉檔案，和接著會使用方法來釋放所有資源。The following code example opens an isolated storage file, uses it to write information to a stream, closes the file, and then uses the method to release all resources. remarks.format: ## Remarks 萬用字元必須只能是中的最後一個項目`searchPattern`。Wildcard characters must only be in the final element of a `searchPattern`. 比方說，「 directory1 / \* 等\*」 是有效的搜尋字串，但"\*等 \* /目錄 」 不是。For instance, "directory1/\*etc\*" is a valid search string, but "\*etc\*/directory" is not. `searchPattern` "Project\Data \*"可讓專案在隔離儲存區範圍中的資料開頭的所有子目錄。The `searchPattern` "Project\Data\*" will give all subdirectories of Project beginning with Data in the isolated storage scope. `searchPattern` "\*"會傳回所有目錄的根目錄中找到。The `searchPattern` "\*" will return all directories located in the root. 如需完整的搜尋字串條件的詳細說明，請參閱類別。For complete description of search string criteria, see the class. 如需取得檔案名稱的資訊，請參閱方法。For information on getting file names, see the method. [如何： 尋找現有的檔案和隔離儲存區中的目錄](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-find-existing-files-and-directories-in-isolated-storage.md)範例示範如何使用方法。The [How to: Find Existing Files and Directories in Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-find-existing-files-and-directories-in-isolated-storage.md) example demonstrates the use of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範方法。The following code example demonstrates the method. 此範例的完整內容，請參閱概觀。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法時，應用程式相關聯的所有組件會使用相同的隔離儲存區。All assemblies associated with an application use the same isolated store when using this method. 只有當應用程式身分識別可以判斷-例如，透過 ClickOnce 部署發行應用程式或 Silverlight 架構應用程式時，可用此方法。This method can be used only when the application identity can be determined - for example, when the application is published through ClickOnce deployment or is a Silverlight-based application. 如果您嘗試使用 ClickOnce 或 Silverlight 架構應用程式之外，這個方法時，您會收到例外狀況，因為無法判斷呼叫端的應用程式識別。If you attempt to use this method outside a ClickOnce or Silverlight-based application, you will receive an exception, because the application identity of the caller cannot be determined. 功能上相當於下列程式碼： is functionally equivalent to the following code: [!code-cpp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CPP/remarks.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CS/remarks.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/VB/remarks.vb#21)] 在此程式碼中，`applicationIdentity`參數`GetStore(IsolatedStorageScope scope, Object applicationIdentity)`是`null`。In this code, the `applicationIdentity` parameter for `GetStore(IsolatedStorageScope scope, Object applicationIdentity)` is `null`.

summary.span: 讓應用程式明確要求更大的配額大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Enables an application to explicitly request a larger quota size, in bytes.

returns.span: 如果接受新配額則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the new quota is accepted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓應用程式明確要求較大的配額大小，以位元組為單位。The method enables an application to explicitly request a larger quota size in bytes. 新的配額大小不能小於目前的配額大小，因為只有配額增加允許。The new quota size must not be smaller than the current quota size, because only quota increases are allowed. 每當方法是呼叫、 隔離的儲存體呼叫方法。Whenever the method is called, isolated storage calls the method. 您可以建立自訂實作原則決策覆寫物件方法，讓物件可以執行為基礎的原則決策物件。You can implement policy decisions by creating a custom object that overrides the method so that the object can perform policy decisions based on a object. 如果找不到自訂物件，配額增加要求遭到拒絕，因為預設實作傳回`false`。If there is no custom object, the quota increase request is denied, because the default implementation for returns `false`. 目前，沒有任何.NET Framework 中的主機提供這項自訂，因此一律會傳回`false`。Currently, none of the hosts in the .NET Framework provide this customization, so always returns `false`.

span.span: is less than current quota size.

exception.span: 小於零，或者小於或等於目前的配額大小。

span.span: is less than zero, or less than or equal to the current quota size.

summary.span: 取得值，表示隔離儲存區在配額建立起來的限制內可以使用的最大空間量。

span.span: Gets a value representing the maximum amount of space available for isolated storage within the limits established by the quota.

value.span: 隔離儲存區空間的限制，以位元組表示。

span.span: The limit of isolated storage space in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用的位元組數目會受到系統管理員所設定的隔離儲存區配額。The number of bytes available is constrained by the isolated storage quota set by the administrator. 配額是根據辨識項的安全性原則中設定，讓相同的程式碼可以接收不同的配額，如果它以不同的辨識項來執行。Quota is configured in security policy on the basis of evidence, so the same code can receive a different quota if it is run with different evidence. 比方說，應用程式在本機執行時，也從內部網路上共用可能會收到不同的配額。For example, an application that is run locally and also from a share on an intranet would likely receive different quotas. [How to： 預期隔離儲存區外的空間條件](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md)範例示範如何使用屬性。The [How to: Anticipate Out-of-Space Conditions with Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md) example demonstrates the use of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 此範例的完整內容，請參閱概觀。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. summary.span: 移除隔離儲存區範圍和所有內容。

span.span: Removes the isolated storage scope and all its contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 這個方法無可挽回的移除整個範圍和所有其包含的目錄和檔案。This method irrevocably removes the entire scope and all contained directories and files. 如果任何目錄或檔案存放區中的正在使用中，存放區移除嘗試失敗，並在存放區已標示為移除。If any of the directories or files in the store are in use, the removal attempt for the store fails and the store is marked for removal. 任何後續的嘗試來修改存放區擲回。Any subsequent attempts to modify the store throw an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來刪除隔離儲存區檔案之後已清空其內容。The following code example uses the method to delete the isolated storage file after its contents have been emptied. [如何： 刪除隔離儲存區中](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-delete-stores-in-isolated-storage.md)範例也示範如何使用方法。The [How to: Delete Stores in Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-delete-stores-in-isolated-storage.md) example also demonstrates the use of the method.
